Sentencas: The facile, rapid, and complete reductive dissolution of CeO2 and ceria-based oxides, known to be highly refractive materials towards dissolution, is reported for the first time in very mild conditions.
Titulo: Vitamin C boosts ceria-based catalyst recycling

Sentencas: Ceria samples are dissolved at room temperature under stirring in a mixture composed of ascorbic acid and a dilute mineral acid.
Titulo: Vitamin C boosts ceria-based catalyst recycling

Sentencas: Normalized dissolution kinetics are compared as a function of the concentration of reactants, nature of the mineral acid, firing temperature and reactive surface area of considered oxides.
Titulo: Vitamin C boosts ceria-based catalyst recycling

Sentencas: Since ceria dissolution can represent a promising alternative for the recycling of automotive catalysts, solid oxide fuel cells, polishing powders, organic chemistry catalysts, sensors, etc., the potential application of the proposed procedure is then studied through the dissolution of catalyst surrogates and complex oxides: Pt/CeO2, (Ce0.75Zr0.25)O-2, and (Ce0.8Tb0.2)O-2.
Titulo: Vitamin C boosts ceria-based catalyst recycling

Sentencas: Whatever the considered sample, the complete and congruent (for mixed oxides) oxide dissolution is observed in 0.5 M ascorbic acid in the presence of dilute nitric or sulfuric acid.
Titulo: Vitamin C boosts ceria-based catalyst recycling

Sentencas: For Pt/CeO2 samples, ceria dissolution goes with Pt aggregation which can be easily recovered from the solution after processing due to its high stability in this medium.
Titulo: Vitamin C boosts ceria-based catalyst recycling

Sentencas: This eco-friendly and efficient method appears very promising for catalyst recycling in comparison to conventional procedures.
Titulo: Vitamin C boosts ceria-based catalyst recycling

Sentencas: After rigorous characterization of the investigated oxides (BET, SEM-EDX, XRD, TGA), dissolution progress is evaluated with ICP-OES and SEM measurements.
